definitions.definition: To make something dangerous or toxic by introducing impurities or foreign matter .
examples: This water is contaminated . It isn't safe to drink.

definitions.definition: To soil, stain, corrupt , or infect by contact or association.
To make unfit for use by the introduction of unwholesome or undesirable elements.
examples: Do not contaminate the peanut butter with the jelly.

definitions.definition: To infect , usually of a deadly virus .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To make something dangerous or toxic by introducing impurities or foreign matter .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To soil, stain, corrupt , or infect by contact or association.
( transitive ) To make unfit for use by the introduction of unwholesome or undesirable elements.
( transitive ) To infect , usually of a deadly virus .
